title: Business Hotel
titleDescription: Business Hotel | Olga Golant | Architect | Visualizations | Graphics | Portfolio site | Varna, Bulgaria
shortDescription: The Business Hotel is situated in the city Varna between bul. “Primorski Polk” and bul. “Vasil Levski”...
longDescription: The site is located in the city Varna between Primmorski Polk and Vasil Levski Blvd in an area populated with residential houses and public buildings. The situation provides very convenient access to public transport facilities.

The building consists of two blocks- low /4 stories/ and high/ 12 stories/ to create a characteristic silhouette. The lower one hosts several functions - a foyer, a restaurant, SPA, a congress centre for about 300 seats, a gallery, a café, retail areas and office spaces. There is also a so-called 'green area' with trees and seating, which provides an oasis within the city's hectic life. The hotel rooms and panorama bar occupy the higher body with 12 stories with excellent views on each floor.
All the storage and the technical rooms are in the basement. Car parking is in the underground on three levels providing 80 car parks.
